alert.note: Alert for Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:19AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Rawlins, western Hitchcock and east central Dundy Counties through 745 AM MDT/845 AM CDT/... At 719 AM MDT/819 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles south of Stratton, or 13 miles east of Benkelman, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stratton around 830 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM MDT/noon CDT/ for northwestern Kansas...and southwestern Nebraska.
